title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
OB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row is deleted. Additionally, the Launch item is moved to the first row. This behavior corrupts the layout.
EB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row should be deleted. However, the second row should remain in the layout. The Launch item should stay on the second row and not be moved to the first row.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Press the Delete button. This will delete the first item on the second row. 2. Observe that the second row is removed and the Launch item is moved to the first row. The Launch item should stay on the second row.
